com.brunomnsilva.smartgraph.graphview

Interface SmartStylableNode

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SmartGraphEdge<E,V>, SmartGraphEdgeBase<E,V>, SmartGraphVertex<V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SmartArrow, SmartGraphEdgeCurve, SmartGraphEdgeLine, SmartGraphVertexNode, SmartLabel

    public interface SmartStylableNode
    A stylable node can have its css properties changed at runtime.
    All Java FX nodes used by SmartGraphPanel to represent graph entities should implement this interface.
    See Also:
    SmartGraphPanel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setStyle(java.lang.String css)
      Applies the css styles to the node.
      void setStyleClass(java.lang.String cssClass)
      Applies the CSS styling defined in class selector cssClass.

    • Method Detail

      • setStyle

        void setStyle(java.lang.String css)
        Applies the css styles to the node. Note that JavaFX styles are cumulative.
        Parameters:
        css - styles

      • setStyleClass

        void setStyleClass(java.lang.String cssClass)
        Applies the CSS styling defined in class selector cssClass. The cssClass string must not contain a preceding dot, e.g., "myClass" instead of ".myClass". The CSS Class must be defined in smartpgraph.css file.
        Parameters:
        cssClass - name of the CSS class.
